title: [K-12] Mobile-Based Art Skill Development Program for Adults with Intellectual Disabilities

context.prior_knowledge: Basic smartphone operation skills and willingness for artistic expression
context.additional_context: Evening classes twice weekly for working professionals, with personalized learning assistant support.

learning_goals: Acquiring digital drawing and simple animation production skills using mobile devices

Learners can perform 5 basic dance movements in VR (3 repetitions each) with ≥80% accuracy and achieve ≥"average" ratings in ≥2 out of 3 peer evaluation rubric criteria (creativity, accuracy, expressiveness).

Learners can plan and produce an art piece (mural, installation art) addressing community issues (e.g., environmental protection, cultural diversity) in 3–4-person team projects, present it at a 2-hour exhibition in a school or local cultural center, and explain the intent to ≥10 visitors.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
